channel.title: IRIS on Nishadh KA

item.title: IRIS install
item.description: IRIS is a python tool for working with NetCDF and Grib files. It is installed to convert WRF output in netCDF to grib2 formate, which is the need for grib2json tool. IRIS is dependent on a large number of scientific python libraries. Most of the libraries are the python and installed through pip install library Installation further gets erroneous due to unavailability of NetCDF, HDF5, NetCDF-python packages. Has to follow this note (http://code.
